page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content: There are only two places of worship in our block, both of them next to each other in Kingswood: the Anglican Church and the Congregational Chapel. Some people in Kingswood go to churches and chapels in other villages and towns. Kingswood Church is quite a small building but it is bigger than the chapel. Inside the church it is neither hot nor cold, but it is cosy and the atmosphere is friendly. The chapel is quite warm and is also quite friendly. At both church and chapel, the services go on for about an hour. The leader of the church is called the Rector. He is also the Vicar of Hillesley, Tresham and Alderley. The leader of the chapel is called the Pastor. The pastor has been in Kingswood for 14 years. Before that he was a gospel singer.
